select cs.id as collectId , cs.song as songId,cs.owner as userId,s.name as songName,s.type as typeId ,t.name as songType,s.singer as singerId,i.name as singerName,cs.collect_time as collectTime,s.time_length as timeLength from collect as cs,song as s,song_type as t,singer as i where cs.song = s.id AND s.singer = i.id AND s.type = t.id
ORDER BY cs.collect_time
